head.title: Embed one document into another in {{FileFormatUp}} with {{ProgLang}} API
head.description: Easily merge {{FileFormatUp}} documents using {{ProgLang}}. With {{ProdShortName}}, combine files seamlessly in just a few steps.

header.title: Combine documents in {{FileFormatUp}} format
header.description: With {{ProdFullName}}, you can quickly embed one {{FileFormatUp}} document into another. This API provides robust tools for precise document merging.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdFullName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a powerful tool for document composition and manipulation. It allows users to embed one document into another, enabling seamless merging of content. With support for over 50 formats—including PDFs, MS Office files, and more—you can organize, edit, and customize the final output to meet your requirements.

more_features.title: Streamline document merging with advanced tools
more_features.description: The {{ProdFullName}} library simplifies embedding one document into another, supporting various file formats and offering customization for seamless integration.

feature_1.title: Generate reports from your business data
feature_1.content: Automatically populate documents with data from JSON, XML, CSV, or other sources, ensuring accurate and efficient workflows.

feature_2.title: Enrich documents with visual elements
feature_2.content: {{ProdShortName}} allows you to include tables, charts, and lists, as well as text, links, images, and dynamically generated barcodes.

feature_3.title: Precisely place and format data
feature_3.content: LINQ-based templates give you control over data placement, let you handle loops for arrays, and allow styling such as color customization.

feature_4.title: Works with multiple file formats
feature_4.content: Easily embed documents into one another across formats like MS Office, PDFs, HTML, OpenOffice, and more.

formats.title: Merge documents in various formats
formats.description: With {{EnvName}} API, you can combine documents across more than 50 supported formats. Effortlessly embed files or sections into your final documents.

operations.title: Discover our powerful tools
operations.description: Explore the features {{ProdShortName}} offers for embedding and merging documents with precision.

examples.comment_1: Add this tag to your template to mark the insertion point
examples.comment_2: Specify the file path for the template
examples.comment_3: Provide the path of the document to be embedded

steps.title: How to merge a document into a {{FileFormatUp}} file

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) allows you to embed one document into another {{FileFormatUp}} file effortlessly. Merge and customize content with ease.
content.step_1: Design a {{FileFormatUp}} template with placeholders for the embedded document.
content.step_2: Define the file path for the template.
content.step_3: Specify the file path of the document to embed.
content.step_4: Save the final file with the embedded content.

code_1.title: How to embed an image into a document programmatically
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to insert an image into a {{FileFormatUp}} document using {{ProdShortName}}.
code_1.comment_1: Add a placeholder tag in your template
code_1.comment_2: Specify the file path for the template
code_1.comment_3: Set the path to the image file
code_1.comment_5: Save the document with the embedded image

texts_pdf.step_1: Design a template with specific placeholders for the content to be embedded (PDF templates are not supported).
texts_pdf.step_4: Export the completed file with the integrated content as a PDF document.
texts_pdf.comment_tmp: Currently, PDF templates cannot be used.
